name: Cycling 2013 (Full Version)
description:
Race to conquer the Yellow Jersey!

In the world of Cycling 2013, you'll be cycling on the road and on the velodrome banked track. While you take on stages through urban areas or in the mountains, you'll need to manage your cyclist's fatigue level and contend with the aggressive moves of your competitors. Are you up to the challenge?

Now, the sport, it's on your iPhone/iPad!
___________________________

3 GAME MODES
Cycling 2013 lets you progress in the single stage mode on any of 15 different courses, but you can also set out to capture the yellow jersey through 10 championships with 3, 5 or 7 stages. And to really get your adrenaline pumping, you can go up against the computer on a bike track with 10 additional challenges.

REALISTIC GRAPHICS
Cycling 2013 immerses you in an authentic atmosphere. You'll progress through detailed and realistic environments accompanied by cinematic effects to celebrate your victories.

GAMEPLAY
Cycling 2013 offers an intuitive game play system that is easy to get the hang of, so it's perfect for both amateurs and the most experienced gamers.

GAMECENTER LEADERBOARD
Challenge the computer or your friends with on-line leaderboard and pulverize the world's records! In every challenge, you can become the uncontested master of the world rankings.

FEATURES
15 urban, countryside, and mountain stages
10 championships with 3, 5 or 7 stages
10 challenges in the cycling velodrome arena
5 difficulty levels
6 athletes with differing performance levels
